Item.ItemVisibleToAll: This item will be visible to all users.
Item.ItemInSalesStatus: In sales status, the item can be sold.
Item.ItemHiddenFromContent: This item will be hidden from the content page.
Item.ItemAvailableForSale: Item will be available for sale.
Item.ItemPublishedAndAvailable: Item will be published and available.
Item.ItemDisplayedButSold: Item will be displayed but sold.
Item.ItemPublishedAndSold: Item will be published and sold.
Item.ItemVisibleAgain: This item will be visible again.

ItemDetail.OnlyZero: Only “0” can be set for now
ItemDetail.CheckBoxMaxLimit: Please check the box if you do not want to set a maximum limit.
ItemDetail.LicenseNotation: Please enter the license notation in this field. ex) 'CC0' or detailed license information.
ItemDetail.PublishedVisible: Once published, this item will be visible to all users.
ItemDetail.SettingsImmutable: Settings cannot be changed afterward (except for price).
ItemDetail.SalesStatus: In sales status, the item can be sold and distributed.
ItemDetail.SelectSalesStatus: If intended for sale/distribution, please select the sales status (On Sale).
ItemDetail.CannotRevertPrivate: You cannot revert to private status.
ItemDetail.PublishedForSale: The item will be published and available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.HiddenContentPage: This item will be hidden from the content page.
ItemDetail.AvailableForSale: The item will be available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.DisplayedButSold: The item will continue to be displayed to all users, but it will be sold or distributed.
ItemDetail.VisibleToAll: This item will once again be visible to all users.
ItemDetail.PublishedAndForSale: The item will be published and will also be available for sale and distribution.
ItemDetail.RequiredFieldsMissing: There are required fields that have not been filled. Please check.
